1553312122212.content: As she was trying to collect her thoughts Zelda's stomach rumbles even more louder as she clutches it in agony "Oh no not again! I....I can't possibly eat anymore...Oh well find you win...I'll just have to find something to eat!" As she stood up and began slowly walking down the untouched parts of the countryside. A young farmer out in his fields was busy tending to his prize winning watermelons for three years in a row he won the annual Hyrule Fruit Growing Competition "Well Bessie." He said to his pet cow "I must say this may be the best lipsmacking,seedless batches of melons around I'm assurion to win this year's contest right ole girl.....what th-" As the bright blue sky suddenly grew pitch dark and the enormous shadow appeared over his small piece of land then a massive leather boot came crashing down crushing a batch of the farmer's other prized possessions tomatoes the cow at his side took one look and ran for it back into the barn as the farmer cried with fright "What in tarnation.... A giant boot....no wait whoa nelly... it's a actual giant...." As it didn't take him to back up a few feet to see the titanic Princess Zelda standing like a statue to the heavens "Excuse me sir sorry to intrude on your home like this...but I need....food...." "Food? What do you mean....hold up you're that royal Princess Zelda aren't you and you're a giant monster? What do you mean by food....." Then as he saw her huge hand slowly reaching towards his prized watermelons on the vines he shrieked "No wait just a minute missy you can't just grab hold of my prized possession melons...I need those to win this year's......" But gently he was shoved into a muddy pigpen as with growing horror he witnessed Zelda scoop up two or three bunches of watermelons and toss them directly into her mouth until absolutely nothing was left and feeling at last full she stood up and began to slowly walk away but the farmer screamed "Hey.Hey you oversized pampered monster! You....you ate all of my melons.....you...." Zelda turned back looking highly ashamed of her actions "I'm terribly sorry sir but I couldn't help it....I'll pay you back somehow..." But the farmer continued to berate and curse at her she paid no mind as she
1553312122212.title: Zelda goes looking for more food

choices: Continue with Zelda's shrunken adventures
Continue from the previous chapter but Zelda changed in another way
155332.content: Zelda felt like she was falling as she saw the world around her shoot upwards. She realized that she was shrinking, not Link or Ganon. "What are you doing to me!? I didn't ask for this!" Zelda shouted. "Your wish was to make your problems small. Now you're going to be small and that's a problem." The triforce laughed. "That isn't what I wanted!" Zelda yelled. "Oh no? Well, then think of this as sort of a lesson, You can't always rely on magic to help you, Princess." The triforce stated. "Agh! How am I supposed to do anything when I'm tiny!?" Zelda asked. The triforce said nothing. Zelda was about to say something when she noticed that she was still shrinking. Smaller and smaller she got until she was barely the size of an ant! "Great, now what?" She asked. The room was so huge and everything in it was bigger than the miniscule princess. At least her clothes had shrunk with her, one thing positive about this situation. She knew she would have to get someone to help her, but would they even see her at her tiny size? Even so, it was the only way to survive this, she thought. And so tiny, tiny Zelda began her quest to find some help...
155332.title: She is the one who actually shrinks

choices: Saw that he was getting up to leave
Heard him talking to Spryte
1553321.content:
Zelda started her quest for help distraught, because of her size, but she was really mostly angry at the triforce for shrinking her. She thought to get rid of the blasted thing once she was back to normal. But that would have to wait, for now, she was busy just trying to get out of the room.

It took her several minutes of walking just to reach the door, and when she had she found herself being somewhat glad that she had shrunken to this size, since she saw that, if she were any bigger she might not have been able to squeeze through.

Once on the outside of the room, Zelda found herself back in the hallway; a long and winding path before she had shrunk, now was amplified to massive scale at the princess's size. She now cursed her size once again, as she knew that it would take her a long time to get anywhere like this.

Zelda sighed and started her journey across her castle. She played it safe, hanging next to the walls, in case anyone came by she'd at least not be stepped on, she hoped.

After several minutes of walking, Zelda heard loud footsteps coming from behind. She looked and saw that it was one of the many maids of the castle. This was the first time Zelda had seen another human being from her reduced perspective, it was a strange sight to be sure as this woman appeared to be a regular giantess from her point of view. Zelda shook her head, she needed to get this giantess's attention somehow. So she ran out in front of her.

"Hey! Down here!" Zelda shouted at the top of her lungs, while jumping up and down and waving her arms.

But the maid just walked on by, showing no reaction to the tiny, shrunken princess below. Zelda could only watch as the giantess got further away, she hung her head in defeat, and kept walking along the wall.

"I can't believe nobody is helping me! I'm the princess for crying out loud!" Zelda complained. "Am I really so small no one can see me?"

Zelda's path through the castle continued slowly, a few more people came by, and the princess tried to get their attention, but each time to no avail. Eventually Zelda made it to a room, the kitchen. She peered her head in to see, and saw that Link was there! He was sitting on next to a table enjoying his lunch. Zelda's eyes lit up, as she finally found one person she was sure could help.

Thinking Link would help her for sure, Zelda ran into the now huge kitchen towards her hero. As she came close to him, she...
1553321.title: Continue with Zelda's shrunken adventures

choices: Show herself to Spryte
Hide and wait for a chance to climb Link
15533212.content:
"Say, have you seen Zelda anywhere? I just finished up my chores for the morning, and thought I could convince her to give me a kiss as a reward!" Link said.

Zelda heard Link, she thought it was a little strange, as there didn't appear to be anyone with him. She thought he was talking to himself. Then, she heard a softer, feminine voice respond to his words.

"Oh please, Link! You're going to have to try harder than that to get Zelda's love!" There was no mistaking that voice, Zelda was sure that it was Spryte talking.

Looking up there to be sure, Zelda couldn't see Spryte from her point of view, the fairy must have been on the table. Zelda hadn't expected to see her with Link, but she wondered if this was in her favor? Since Spryte was so small already, Zelda figured she'd have a better chance of being seen by the fairy. She just wished that she could get Spryte's attention, thinking that that would make things much easier for her. But with her down on the floor, and Spryte all the way up on the table, there was little chance of that happening.

Zelda shrugged and kept on walking to Link. She thought that climbing him was her only option at this point.

"So why not just forget about her and come with me?" Zelda overheard Spryte ask. Zelda cringed, how could she forget about the fairy princess's crush on Link? She wondered if that might make getting Spryte's attention not such a good idea. The fairy princess might just crush her to get her out of the way between Link and herself. Zelda gulped at the thought. Spryte wouldn't do that, would she?

"Uh, no thanks. Zelda's the one for me!" Link said.

That made Zelda smile. But then, something huge fell down next to her. The shrunken princess shrieked and jumped back out of fright. She noticed that it was... a huge meatball?

"Uup, Whoops!" Link exclaimed as he suddenly reached down to the floor.

"I've got it!" Spryte chirped.

Zelda shot up at hearing this, she looked up and saw Spryte, and the fairy was flying down to her, or rather, to the food to pick it up for Link. Zelda hesitated for a moment. She wondered whether or not she should try and get Spryte's attention...
15533212.title: And the fairy princess

choices: "I'll help you out!" Spryte is nice
"I'll take good care of you." Spryte is mean
155332121.content:
As Spryte touched down on the floor, Zelda ran up to her and called out to her.

"Spryte!" She shouted.

Spryte turned and looked up, she thought she heard Zelda's voice calling her, but she couldn't see the princess anywhere.

"Down here!" Zelda shouted.

Spryte heard Zelda more clearly this time, she looked down and saw princess Zelda on the floor beneath her at only the size of a doll to herself!

"P-Princess..!?" Spryte exclaimed.

"Yes, it's me! Now, can you get me some help, please?" Zelda asked.

Spryte stepped over to Zelda, casting a large shadow over the smaller woman, who was starting to question her decision to trust Spryte. Zelda thought she must look as small to Spryte as Spryte did to her at her normal size. The fairy swooped down and grabbed Zelda, who screamed at this invasion of space. In the next instant, Zelda found herself looking into the eyes of Spryte.

"This is cool!" Spryte said happily.

"Spryte, please! Just show me to Link!" Zelda cried. "And be more careful with me!" She squirmed in Spryte's hand.

"Oh, sorry!" Spryte said. She opened her hand and allowed Zelda to lay in her palm. "Better?"

"Yes, thank you. Now-" Zelda was cut off by a huge finger poking at her. "Ah!" She squeaked, and tried to push the invading finger away, but it was no use, Spryte was too strong.

"You're so small!" Spryte said happily, almost squealing with delight, as she continued to poke and prod the shrunken princess Zelda. "I never thought I'd find someone smaller than myself! And to have it be you, no less!"

Spryte smiled as she continued to play with the shrunken princess. But then she remembered something, and stopped her finger assault on Zelda. "But wait..." Spryte started. "Didn't you go to the Triforce to shrink Link or Ganon, or something?" She asked.

"That's what I've been trying to tell you!" Zelda shouted. "I went to the Triforce to shrink them, but it shrunk me instead! It said making me this small was a lesson, and not to rely on magic so much!"

Spryte burst out laughing upon hearing Zelda's sad story, much to the shrunken princess's displeasure. Zelda stood up and put her hands on her hips to show Spryte she didn't appreciate the way the fairy was treating her. Spryte saw this and laughed again.

"Spryte!" Zelda cried. "You need to help me!"

"Ha ha..! I'm sorry, Princess." Spryte said, wiping tears of laughter from her eyes. "Don't worry, Zelda..."
155332121.title: The fairy and the shrunken princess

choices: Zelda manages to squeeze out of her prison
Later, Spryte takes Zelda out to play with
1553321212.content:
".. I'll take good care of you!" Spryte chimed all too happily. A dubious smirk creeping across the fairy's face, it and Spryte's tone made Zelda nervous.

"Thank you, Spryte." Zelda said cautiously. Spryte's action were beginning to get suspect, and she started to wonder if her earlier apprehension was not completely unfounded.

Then, a louder voice came from above the two. "Hey, Spryte, what are you doing down there?" It was Link who asked the question.

Zelda looked up to see her hero looking down at her, or at Spryte rather, since she figured she must be too small to be seen from his point of view. Zelda looked at Spryte, who was also staring up at the giant, Zelda hoped that Spryte would reveal her presence to him so that he could help her somehow.

"Sorry! I'll be right back!" Spryte shouted.

Link shrugged and went back to his meal.

"Now how to get up there? I can't quite fly and carry you at the same time, princess." Spryte pouted, pretending to ponder her question.

"Spryte, please! You said you'd take care of me!" Zelda yelled.

Spryte's eyes lit up at Zelda's words, she looked like a lightbulb just went off in her head. With a snap of her fingers, she said, "That's a good idea! I know just how to take care of you!" She smiled at the tinier Zelda.

"Spryte..." Zelda said with trepidation.

Spryte smiled at the little passenger on her hand again, and then closed her hand. Zelda tried to protest, but her cries were muffled by the walls of flesh that now surrounded her. Spryte ignored her and then used her other hand to open the top of her pink dress, then she raised the hand with Zelda in it over her cleavage and dropped the tiny princess in. Spryte watched with glee as Zelda screamed as she fell, once Zelda was safely tucked in between her breasts, Spryte patted her dress shut and smiled, content with where Zelda was.

"Spryte!" Zelda screamed.

The Hyrulean princess was now completely irate with her fairy servant, and was already thinking of ways to punish her for her disobedience. Those thoughts were only backdrops to the main thing on her mind, getting out of Spryte's cleavage. She struggled and tried to move, but it was no use. When Zelda had fallen into Spryte's dress, she had fallen straight down, and as a result, her legs and most of her lower body had gotten wedged between the huge, fleshy mounds that surrounded her. Zelda was effectively stuck until Spryte decided to remove her from her prison.

Meanwhile, Spryte had flown back up to the table. She had given Link his precious meatball and was finishing up her own meal. As she ate, she enjoyed the squirms of her tiny passenger. She was thankful that she was so small, and that Zelda was even smaller, since it made hiding Zelda all the more easier to do, the whole time her and Link ate at the table he never suspected a thing!

Spryte smiled at this "victory" over Zelda. She thought about how after fighting with Zelda over Link for so long, she now had her rival right where she wanted her. She beamed inwardly at all the things they'd do together, and, with Zelda out of the picture, Link was hers for the taking. Spryte sat back and relaxed, this day had turned out pretty nice.
1553321212.title: Spryte is mean

choices: Spryte grabs Zelda again
Link notices Zelda's tiny form at last
15533212121.content:
As Spryte relaxed and enjoyed her time with Link, Zelda was trying to get out of the fairy princess's cleavage, and she was finding it hard to do with her legs still stuck. Zelda tried pulling her legs out with her arms and was pleasantly surprised to find that it was working, slowly at first, but there was a little more give every passing second, and soon Zelda had her left leg free!

She repeated the process with her right, and climbed out of Spryte's cleavage. Zelda breathed in fresh air now that she was out, she knew she didn't have time to enjoy her freedom just yet though. Looking up at Spryte's looming face, Zelda could see the fairy was looking rather uncomfortable, she must've felt Zelda escaping. The Hyrulean princess smiled at this, she wasn't worried that Spryte would make any immediate moves against her, not with Link looking on, it seemed Spryte was just trying to ignore her for now.

Taking her chance, Zelda clambered across Spryte's breasts to the side of the fairy's dress. She looked down, the drop to the surface of the table was far by her point of view, but not enough to seriously injure her, she hoped. Taking a deep breath, Zelda braced herself and jumped down!

Meanwhile, Spryte was getting more and more nervous, having not only felt Zelda escape, but also jump off of her. The fairy princess couldn't help but glance down to take a look, and sure enough she saw Zelda's bug-sized body running away, just inches from herself. Spryte was starting to sweat, she needed to get that unruly princess back, and fast!

"Huh? Now what is it?" Link asked.

"Uh, nothing!" Spryte quickly replied, eyeing Zelda's tiny form running away from her and to the giant. "I just dropped something!"

Spryte ran over to Zelda and tried to pick her up, but Zelda was too fast, and she missed! Spryte growled at Zelda and tried again, this time successfully getting her prey. She smiled wickedly as she brought the squirming woman up to her face again.

"Don't you ever try anything like that ever agai- Ow!" Spryte squeaked in pain as Zelda bit the fairy's hand, interrupting her threats and causing her to drop the shrunken princess.

When Zelda hit the floor she took off running as fast as she could towards Link, she waved her arms high to try and get his attention, but it didn't seem to be working. Zelda could quickly see why, from the way he was looking Link seemed to be too preoccupied with Spryte. Zelda groaned, her plan to get away from the fairy had the unforeseen consequence of also getting Link's attention, but not in the way she intended!

"Spryte, what's wrong? Did you hurt yourself?" Link asked with concern.

"Uh... it's n-nothing...! Don't worry about it!" Spryte stammered, rubbing her bitten hand.

"So who were you talking to?" Link asked wryly. "Were you talking to yourself?" He laughed.

"No! I was..." Spryte said, barely paying much mind to Link, right now she was focused on getting Zelda back in her clutches. She eyed the ant-sized form of the princess, running along the table again, the tiny woman was almost at Link by this point, and Spryte knew she had to act fast.

Next...
15533212121.title: Escape from the fairy

choices: She really did feel bad. Spryte relents
She didn't care. Spryte stays cruel
155332121211.content:
Spryte ran after Zelda again, this time not caring what Link would think of her. It didn't take long for the fairy to catch up to the much smaller woman. She reached down and tried to grab Zelda, but the shrunken princess jumped over her hand. Spryte was getting mad at her now, Zelda was too close to Link for her liking.

"Not so fast!" Spryte said.

The tiny fairy reached out and grabbed Zelda's tinier form off the table.

"No! Noo!" Zelda cried.

Zelda tried in vain the reach out for Link from Spryte's hand, but the fairy was too strong, and Zelda was pulled away from her hero and back to the clutches of the cruel Spryte.

"Stay still!" Spryte shouted at her captive.

Zelda was too scared to do anything else, so she complied. Spryte grinned and stuffed Zelda back into her cleavage.

"Spryte? What are you doing?" Link asked, oblivious as ever.

Spryte looked up at him, but says nothing. Instead, she just flies off, out of the window of the kitchen. Leaving Link to wonder what her problem was.

Now in the air and away from prying eyes Spryte checked on her tiny prisoner. The shrunken princess Zelda was staying in her cleavage quite nicely, although she cured Spryte for doing this her, the fairy ignored her complaints and flew off again, giving her chest a pat before going.

After a minute Spryte reached her destination, princess Zelda's room. She flew up slowly to the window of the room to peek in and, when she saw it was empty, she flew into the room itself. Spryte landed on Zelda's bed, where she took the shrunken princess out. She again enjoyed the power she had over the formerly most powerful woman in Hyrule.

"Welcome to your room, Princess!" Spryte said mockingly. "Didn't I say I'd take good care of you?"

"What have I done to deserve this!?" Zelda shouted through sobs, which made Spryte notice Zelda was crying. "Why are you doing this to me, Spryte!?"

Spryte looked down at the ant-sized woman sobbing in her hand. She sort of felt bad for making the princess cry, but...
155332121211.title: Spryte grabs Zelda again

choices: Signature growing spell on herself reaching up to 50 feet!
She shrinks Zelda even further!
1553321212111.content: As much as she was truly enjoying the sher power she had over the royal princess Spryte still had some humanity in a matter of speaking within her heart as she then surprisingly whispered "Okay Princess Zelda sorry I have been such a selfish meanie towards you I....I just enjoyed seeing you of all people know what's its like to be the tiny,puny little person for a change the way you fully sized humans like to prance around here making me feel less important now you're the teensy helpless fairy...but despite you're puny size you're still the princess of Hyrule and like or not I have little choice but to do as you ask..." The tiny Zelda asked hopefully "So then you'll let me go?" Spryte frowned "I didn't say that...I only said I'll start treating you a little nicer and with respect do you want me to show you to Link sad your father?" Zelda cringed at this "No way Spryte! Link would possibly treat me even worse than you! And my father.....no telling how he would react! Can't you just use your magic and...ohh what am I saying...your magic isn't strong enough..." The faerie princess huffed as she buzzed around the shrunken princess' room like a fly while Zelda stood on her own dresser barely taller than her hairbrush! "Excuse me but I just so happen to be very powerful in ways of magic princess faerie magic may not be as strong as something like the Triforce or Ganon's own but in a flash I can grow you back to your grumpy ole self!" The princess screamed jumping up and down "Then what are you waiting for Spryte? All this time you spent playing around with me! Come on turn me back already!" The faerie huffed and grumbled to herself "Humph it was just a bit of fun...sheesh can't you take a joke....hang on....." She thought to herself quietly("Why should I turn her back to normal when she would as usual lord over me and other tiny creatures? We faeries have spent all our lives fearful of things bigger than us....maybe it's time for me to even the odds just this once.....what harm could it do?") "Spryte,Spryte are you alright,aren't you going to turn me back to normal or not?" A impatient Zelda cried not knowing that silently smirking to herself the faerie prepared to cast her
1553321212111.title: She really did feel bad. Spryte relents

choices: Follow 50 ft. Spryte's adventures
Follow ant-sized Zelda still on her dresser
15533212121111.content:
Spryte cast her magic spell at last. Zelda sighed in relief, thinking she was finally going to grow back to her normal size.

"Thank you, Spryte. I.. I.." Zelda stammered when she saw that Spryte's magic was not effecting her at all, instead it was the fairy princess who the magic glowed around. "Spryte..?" Zelda asked cautiously.

"Sorry, princess. I think it's about time Hyrule got a new ruler!" Spryte told the shrunken princess below her.

Zelda gasped at Spryte's betrayal. She then got worried when she thought about what Spryte meant by a "new ruler" and was afraid of what Spryte's magic could do.

Then, Spryte's magic started to kick in and it made her start to grow! Zelda watched horrified as the fairy who already towered over her started growing even more massive.
Spryte grinned happily to herself and let the changes continue. She grew to a foot tall, then in the next moment, 2 feet tall. Spryte's growth was rapidly increasing as her body got bigger and bigger.

Soon Zelda's room started to crumble around the growing fairy princess's body. The fairy princess herself wasn't hurt at all by the destruction she was causing, and she didn't really care too much either, she was just caught up in the awesome feeling of growing more powerful. Spryte looked down at the dresser Zelda is on and saw that she could barely even see the princess's tiny form now.

"Wow! You look even smaller now, princess!" Spryte taunted the tiny princess Zelda.

"Spryte! What have you done!?" Zelda shouted at the top of her lungs, but Spryte couldn't hear even the faintest squeak from Zelda's bug-sized form.

"I can't hear you! You'll just have to stay down there for a while, okay?" Spryte told her giddily.

Spryte smirked at Zelda's miniscule form. Growing herself had made her feel powerful, and with Zelda out of the picture, there wasn't a limit to what she could do with her new stature.

A minute later, Spryte growth slowed to a halt and left the formally tiny fairy princess huge at a whoppping 50 feet tall!

Zelda's room was almost completely destroyed by Spryte's growth, but the damage was mostly contained to the walls which Spryte had bursted through, leaving the ant-sized princess relatively safe, but stranded on her own dresser.

Spryte stood tall over the denizens of the castle, and even the castle itself. The mega-sized fairy princess looked down upon the smaller sights, and wondered what do to with her new size first. She grinned at seeing the tiny people flee from her giant form, and it made her feel all the more powerful.

"I should have done this a long time ago!" Spryte said happily.
15533212121111.title: Zelda betrayed

choices: She begins to play around with the people
Her stomach starts growling
155332121211111.content: For Spryte the former tiny fairy barely bigger than a hummingbird this was truly exciting "Oh my Hehehe look at how the little people of Hyrule cower and run from me! I really must be gigantic compared to them!" She said happily as she studied herself in a nearby tower that had a mirror reflecting from it indeed the biggest part of the castle only came up to her upper thighs now and the people looked no more than dolls to her even the Royal palace guards were terrified as they saw the enormous fairy curiously peeking over the hills to what lied beyond the small Kingdom of course now that she was giant sized her actual magic was netrualized so she could no longer fly due to her wings disappearing when she started growing "Oh boy this is so exciting I can't wait to show Link what's become of me now that icky,mean Princess Zelda is merely a speck of dust he'll surely want me as his future girlfriend!" She said thought happily but remembered "Oh wait Link is visiting relatives in his hometown so he won't be back for a while now....Oh well I still have a whole kingdom of cute tinies to play with...." As she began to take her first step as expected things flew into the air as her pink slipper hit the pavement people ran for cover those who couldn't run grabbed onto anything bolted to the ground meanwhile with the tiny Zelda she had just climbed down from the really tall dresser and was looking around at her destroyed room "Ohhh my room! That annoying fairy is going to pay dearly for this Spryte's really gone off the deep end this time keeping me shrunk like this while she's now a giant....I got to try and stop her somehow Oh wait the Triforce...I have to get to it somehow..." As she started running for one of the many holes in the floor looking for a way to get upstairs to the room where the Triforce was hidden meanwhile with the giant Spryte
155332121211111.title: Follow 50 ft. Spryte's adventures

choices: Spryte finds Zelda
Something else catches Spryte's attention
1553321212111111.content:
Spryte was having the time of her life as she played around in her toy-sized surroundings. But her enjoyment came at the cost of the people of the town. Spryte's giant size could not be contained in the city, so nearly every time she made a quick or careless movement, something in town was sure to be destroyed. Entire houses and shops were getting crushed or otherwise demolished by the playful fairy giantess.

"Hee hee! This is amazing!" Spryte giggled.

The giant fairy continued to skip happily across Hyrule castle town, only somewhat aware of the destruction she was causing. She wasn't so heartless as to want to cause mayhem, she was just too caught up in messing around at giant size to really notice or care.

One of the tiny villagers in town caught her eye. She was a small young woman, who happened to look a little like the princess Zelda. At Spryte's size, this young woman looked more like a doll to the fairy, and Spryte wanted to play.

"Hello!" Spryte called out to the cowering woman.

Spryte didn't wait for a response, instead she simply picked up the tiny woman off the ground and played around with the woman in her massive hand, shuffling her around a little roughly. The woman screamed when she was picked up, and then started to cry as Spryte "played" with her.

"What's the matter with you?" Spryte asked impatiently, poking the poor woman in her chest. "I'm not going to hurt you! I just want to play!"

"Leave me alone! Please!" The woman cried. Spryte frowned.

"Fine!" The giantess fairy snapped. "You know you like Zelda, but you're not nearly as fun to mess with!"

Spryte tossed the woman back onto the ground, causing her to fall some 10 feet before landing and bruising her body sore. Spryte didn't bother paying the poor little woman any more mind though, she just stood up and looked back at the castle. She grinned grimly.

"Oh, Zeeelda..!" Spryte said in a sing-song voice. She stepped over the rubble of castle town and made her way towards Hyrule castle again.
1553321212111111.title: She begins to play around with the people

info.description:
Do whatever you want to the princess of Hyrule and friends!

Pretty much anything goes really.
All I ask is that you write well and keep to the established continuity of the chapters.
And keep the focus on Princess Zelda!

No rules besides that.
